pr_title: Fix SQL JSON inner OBJECTs serialization

timeline.message: Fix SQL JSON inner OBJECTs serialization

timeline.bodyText: Does it somehow relate to the json object change?

timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Not really, while going through JSON changes I have spotted that this particular assert could be improved (similarly to JSON).
